response.overview: Shot on super eight film in the early 90s and re-filmed to video in 2014. When I released my c.d. Globe Notes a musician friend said it reminded him of a trip to Bali as a child being transported, half asleep, half dreaming, part awake, through the Balinese  countryside at night by bicycle rickshaw. The audio is from a recording of my live soundtrack performance for the silent film 'Legong' that I performed for Across Asia Film Festiva at the MAXXI in Rome June 2014.
response.title: Walking in Bali
